Movie.Storyline: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.
Movie.Title: The Maltese Falcon

Movie.Storyline: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
Movie.Title: How to Train Your Dragon

Movie.Storyline: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.
Movie.Title: Trainspotting

Director.Name: Victor Fleming, George Cukor, Sam Wood

Movie.Storyline: A manipulative Southern belle carries on a turbulent affair with a blockade runner during the American Civil War.
Movie.Title: Gone with the Wind

Movie.Storyline: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.
Movie.Title: Into the Wild

Movie.Storyline: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.
Movie.Title: 12 Years a Slave

Movie.Storyline: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazi judges for war crimes.
Movie.Title: Judgment at Nuremberg

Movie.Storyline: The true story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.
Movie.Title: Hotel Rwanda

Movie.Storyline: A young woman from England comes to India to make a documentary about her grandfather's diary which was written in the 1920s about the Indian Independence with five young men.
Movie.Title: Colour It Yellow

Movie.Storyline: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.
Movie.Title: The Sixth Sense

Movie.Storyline: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.
Movie.Title: A Beautiful Mind

Movie.Storyline: An ex-tennis pro carries out a plot to murder his wife. When things go wrong, he improvises a brilliant plan B.
Movie.Title: Dial M for Murder

Movie.Storyline: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.
Movie.Title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid

Movie.Storyline: Scientists in the Antarctic are confronted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of the people that it kills.
Movie.Title: The Thing

Movie.Storyline: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous Hungarian hotel between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.
Movie.Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel

Movie.Storyline: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
Movie.Title: No Country for Old Men

Movie.Storyline: The Bride wakens from a four-year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her - a team she was once part of.
Movie.Title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1

Movie.Storyline: A young recruit in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.
Movie.Title: Platoon

Movie.Storyline: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
Movie.Title: Finding Nemo

Movie.Storyline: In a decrepit South American village, men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.
Movie.Title: The Wages of Fear

Movie.Storyline: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.
Movie.Title: Mary and Max

Movie.Storyline: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.
Movie.Title: Life of Brian

Director.Name: Frank Miller, Robert Rodriguez, Quentin Tarantino

Movie.Storyline: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.
Movie.Title: Sin City

Movie.Storyline: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall.
Movie.Title: Annie Hall

Movie.Storyline: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.
Movie.Title: Network

Movie.Storyline: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.
Movie.Title: Touch of Evil

Movie.Storyline: The wife of a cruel headmaster and his mistress conspire to kill him, but after the murder is committed, his body disappears, and strange events begin to plague the two women.
Movie.Title: Diabolique

Movie.Storyline: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history, and fulfill their mother's last wishes.
Movie.Title: Incendies

Movie.Storyline: A classic fairy tale, with swordplay, giants, an evil prince, a beautiful princess, and yes, some kissing (as read by a kindly grandfather).
Movie.Title: The Princess Bride

Movie.Storyline: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.
Movie.Title: Stand by Me

Movie.Storyline: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.
Movie.Title: Amores Perros

Director.Name: Victor Fleming, George Cukor, Mervyn LeRoy, Norman Taurog, King Vidor

Movie.Storyline: Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.
Movie.Title: The Wizard of Oz

Movie.Storyline: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.
Movie.Title: There Will Be Blood

Movie.Storyline: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.
Movie.Title: Ben-Hur

Movie.Storyline: Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. assembles a team of superheroes to save the planet from Loki and his army.
Movie.Title: The Avengers

Movie.Storyline: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.
Movie.Title: Million Dollar Baby

Movie.Storyline: A poor Midwest family is forced off of their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.
Movie.Title: The Grapes of Wrath

Movie.Storyline: Intensely touching story of a misunderstood young adolescent who left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.
Movie.Title: The 400 Blows

Movie.Storyline: A drama based on the true story of a college professor's bond with the abandoned dog he takes into his home.
Movie.Title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale

Movie.Storyline: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.
Movie.Title: How to Train Your Dragon 2

Movie.Storyline: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.
Movie.Title: In the Name of the Father

Movie.Storyline: Three WWII veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.
Movie.Title: The Best Years of Our Lives

Movie.Storyline: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.
Movie.Title: The Bourne Ultimatum

Movie.Storyline: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.
Movie.Title: Donnie Darko

Movie.Storyline: A nurse is put in charge of an actress who can't talk and finds that the actress's persona is melding with hers.
Movie.Title: Persona

Movie.Storyline: A psychotic socialite confronts a pro tennis star with a theory on how two complete strangers can get away with murder...a theory that he plans to implement.
Movie.Title: Strangers on a Train

Movie.Storyline: Biography of Mohandas K. Gandhi, the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.
Movie.Title: Gandhi

Movie.Storyline: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.
Movie.Title: 8ВЅ

Movie.Storyline: Warrior/pacifist Princess NausicaГ¤ desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.
Movie.Title: NausicaГ¤ of the Valley of the Wind

Movie.Storyline: A marshall, personally compelled to face a returning deadly enemy, finds that his own town refuses to help him.
Movie.Title: High Noon

Movie.Storyline: When a gigantic great white shark begins to menace the small island community of Amity, a police chief, a marine scientist and grizzled fisherman set out to stop it.
Movie.Title: Jaws

Movie.Storyline: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.
Movie.Title: Infernal Affairs

Movie.Storyline: The story of King George VI of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, his impromptu ascension to the throne and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch become worthy of it.
Movie.Title: The King's Speech

Movie.Storyline: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?
Movie.Title: Notorious

Movie.Storyline: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.
Movie.Title: Twelve Monkeys

Movie.Storyline: A human-looking indestructible cyborg is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.
Movie.Title: The Terminator

Movie.Storyline: Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.
Movie.Title: Fanny and Alexander

Movie.Storyline: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with his newly purchased operating system that's designed to meet his every need.
Movie.Title: Her

Movie.Storyline: Harry, Ron and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.
Movie.Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

Movie.Storyline: A semi-biographical account of Yip Man, the first martial arts master to teach the Chinese martial art of Wing Chun.
Movie.Title: Ip Man

Movie.Storyline: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.
Movie.Title: Stalker

Movie.Storyline: A weatherman finds himself living the same day over and over again.
Movie.Title: Groundhog Day

Movie.Storyline: In 1954, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is investigating the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane and is presumed to be hiding near-by.
Movie.Title: Shutter Island

Director.Name: Charles Laughton, Robert Mitchum, Terry Sanders

Movie.Storyline: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.
Movie.Title: The Night of the Hunter

Movie.Storyline: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the heavy-weight champion, Apollo Creed, in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
Movie.Title: Rocky

Movie.Storyline: A care-free girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.
Movie.Title: The Road

Movie.Storyline: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.
Movie.Title: Dog Day Afternoon

Movie.Storyline: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.
Movie.Title: Before Sunrise

Movie.Storyline: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.
Movie.Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl

Movie.Storyline: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers...
Movie.Title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India

Movie.Storyline: After local youth Abdel is beaten unconscious by police, a riot ensues on his estate during which a policeman loses his gun. The gun is found by Vinz who threatens he will kill a cop if Abdel dies.
Movie.Title: La Haine

Director.Name: Pete Docter, David Silverman, Lee Unkrich

Movie.Storyline: Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but they are terribly afraid themselves of being contaminated by children, so when one enters Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley finds his world disrupted.
Movie.Title: Monsters, Inc.

Movie.Storyline: A bitter aging couple with the help of alcohol, use a young couple to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other.
Movie.Title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?

Movie.Storyline: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.
Movie.Title: Barry Lyndon

Movie.Storyline: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.
Movie.Title: The Big Sleep

Movie.Storyline: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.
Movie.Title: The Battle of Algiers

Movie.Storyline: In 1986, in the province of Gyunggi, in South Korea, a second young and beautiful woman is found dead, raped and tied and gagged with her underwear. Detective Park Doo-Man and Detective Cho...<a href="//m.imdb.com/title/tt0353969/plotsummary?ref_=m_tt_ov_pl">
Movie.Title: Memories of Murder

Movie.Storyline: Recent college graduate Benjamin Braddock is trapped into an affair with Mrs. Robinson, who happens to be the wife of his father's business partner and then finds himself falling in love with her daughter, Elaine.
Movie.Title: The Graduate

Movie.Storyline: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.
Movie.Title: Castle in the Sky

Movie.Storyline: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.
Movie.Title: A Fistful of Dollars

Movie.Storyline: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.
Movie.Title: Roman Holiday

Movie.Storyline: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African-American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.
Movie.Title: The Help

Movie.Storyline: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.
Movie.Title: The Hustler

Movie.Storyline: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a T.V. show.
Movie.Title: The Truman Show

Movie.Storyline: At Helge's 60th birthday party, some unpleasant family truths are revealed.
Movie.Title: The Celebration

Movie.Storyline: Only a short time after the first raid, Rama goes undercover with the thugs of Jakarta and plans to bring down the syndicate and uncover the corruption within his police force.
Movie.Title: The Raid 2

Movie.Storyline: A man and a woman move in to neighboring Hong Kong apartments and form a bond when they both suspect their spouses of extramarital activities.
Movie.Title: In the Mood for Love

Movie.Storyline: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
Movie.Title: Jurassic Park

Movie.Storyline: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums, becomes a contestant on the Indian version of "Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?" He is arrested under suspicion of cheating, and while being interrogated, events from his life history are shown which explain why he knows the answers.
Movie.Title: Slumdog Millionaire

Movie.Storyline: When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German POW camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.
Movie.Title: Stalag 17

Movie.Storyline: Ralphie has to convince his parents, his teacher, and Santa that a Red Ryder B.B. gun really is the perfect gift for the 1940s.
Movie.Title: A Christmas Story

Movie.Storyline: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead and discovers her captor to be an enchanted prince.
Movie.Title: Beauty and the Beast

Movie.Storyline: Two young men strangle their "inferior" classmate, hide his body in their apartment, and invite his friends and family to a dinner party as a means to challenge the "perfection" of their crime.
Movie.Title: Rope

Movie.Storyline: Crooks plan and execute a daring race-track robbery.
Movie.Title: The Killing

Movie.Storyline: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.
Movie.Title: Before Sunset

Movie.Storyline: After a prison riot, former-Captain Nascimento, now a high ranking security officer in Rio de Janeiro, is swept into a bloody political dispute that involves government officials and paramilitary groups.
Movie.Title: Elite Squad: The Enemy Within

Movie.Storyline: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.
Movie.Title: Swades

Movie.Storyline: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.
Movie.Title: Papillon

Movie.Storyline: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.
Movie.Title: Blood Diamond

Movie.Storyline: The true story of Elle editor Jean-Dominique Bauby who suffers a stroke and has to live with an almost totally paralyzed body; only his left eye isn't paralyzed.
Movie.Title: The Diving Bell and the Butterfly
